mapper.select: SELECT city, country, street, phone, email FROM main.contacts_of_vendor c join main.vendor_to_manufacturer_map vm ON vm.vendor_id=c.vendor_id join main.maker_to_furniture_map mf ON mf.id = vm.manufacturer_id JOIN main.furniture f ON f.id = mf.furniture_id join main.type t ON f.type_id = #{typeId} where f.title = #{title}
